label: Footwear and Insoles
description: Products and solutions for foot-related issues, including plantar fasciitis, flat feet, high arches, and supination.
intents: Find shoes for specific foot conditions

subcategories.label: Insoles
subcategories.description: Inserts for shoes that provide additional support and comfort for various foot conditions.

subcategories.label: Footwear
subcategories.description: Shoes and sandals designed for specific foot conditions and needs.

subcategories.label: Over the Knee Boots
subcategories.description: Boots that extend above the knee, designed for wider calves and feet.

subcategories.label: Slippers
subcategories.description: Comfortable indoor footwear for various foot conditions and needs.

subcategories.label: Socks and Accessories
subcategories.description: Socks and other accessories designed for foot comfort and support.
